name: getmediumquestion
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool leetcodeapi.
Tool description: The API fetches basic information of a LeetCode profile based on the provided username.
API description: Fetches the number of medium-level questions solved by the given user from the LeetCode API.

username.description: The username of the LeetCode user whose medium-level questions solved count is to be fetched.
